name: GoodCrypto private server
short_description:
Enterprise encrypted email made easy. Just add a filter to protect everyone's email and browsing. Your users keep using the mail clients and browsers they know.

GoodCrypto private server runs on your hardware. It integrates with your Postfix through a content filter. Email is automatically encrypted and decrypted mail. There's no key management.
summary: Enterprise encrypted email. Just add a filter to protect group's email
